name: Asteroid Shooter (Theraha)
description:
a basic arcade shooter game ,I just wanted to make some small and short game to improve my unity knowledge ,and this project taught me so many things ,and I am happy with what I came with in the end.

also Please give suggestions on what I can add more in this game or bugs u faced while playing ,Thank you and have a nice day

Followed Zigorous channel to make the game 

https://www.youtube.com/c/Zigurous/videos

W-to thrust ship

A/D - to rotate ship

*you can also use arrows to thrust and rotate ship
